alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Lorain; Medina; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 1:39PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Medina, Cuyahoga, northern Summit and east central Lorain Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 138 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Strongsville, or 10 miles north of Medina, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Medina, Parma, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, Brunswick, North Royalton, Solon, Twinsburg, Warrensville Heights, Macedonia, Grafton, Highland Hills, Garfield Heights, Shaker Heights, Maple Heights, South Euclid, Parma Heights, Broadview Heights and Brook Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Ohio.
